attributes.action: Solve the Road pollution and Red Diesel Issues by Lowering BioFuel Duty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to lower emissions from Road vehicles and to provide a low-duty alternative to red diesel for marine use, I propose that the government should reduce the the duty and VAT on BioFuels such as Biodiesel and Ethanol to the lowest amount possible under EU rules. Thereby reducing carbon emissions by increasing the use of low-carbon fuels using an incentive-based system, rather than punitive duty increases or "spy in the cab" technology.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
